itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the new official name of CHAZ, Seattle is now CHOP, the two make fun of weird looking celebrities such as Wendy’s Wendy Thomas and Haley Joel Osment, the two talk about the killing of Rayshard Brooks in Atlanta, Elon Musk is a year away from creating a brain chip that will enable the brain to heal itself, and scientists believe there is over 30 other active civilizations in our galaxy and have proof one is trying to contact us.
